attributes.additional_details: Because I don't identify with the current debate, and don't believe many others do either.  It is very one sided and ill informed.  It brings out a nasty unattractive and I believe in British side of this nation.  We forget how many of our families came here as immigrants or refugees, and how important that was to our families' survival & safety.  We wanted to help Ukrainians in trouble, we now need to step up and lead the way, in how to help the world, help people in trouble elsewhere
attributes.background: Change the narrative about immigration and refugees.  Promote British values of compassion, understanding, kindness etc.  Concentrate, not on them arriving here, but what and why people are leaving other countries, so the public is better informed.

rejection.details: You could start a petition setting out more clearly what specific changes you'd like to make to immigration and/or refugee policy.
